package_modal_body: Your game balance top up for: {amount}USD, now You can play!
low_balance: Your main balance is low. Please top up you main balance!
game_rules_text_1: The rules of the game are very simple
game_rules_text_2: When replenishing the game balance for one of the indicated amounts, you can count on the approach to it
game_rules_text_3: For example: Having replenished the balance by $ 100, you can play both 5% of the balance ($ 5) and 100% ($ 100), and in case of loss, the cashback will be 20%
game_rules_text_4: By increasing the amount of the bet, you increase the percentage of cashback.
game_rules_text_5: Test your understanding of the market, enter the trade!
